entities.party: Canonical representation of a customer (person or organization) in the enterprise platform
entities.subscription: Represents an active telecom service connection such as a mobile line assigned to a customer
entities.account: Represents a billing account used for charging telecom services
entities.party_identifier: Stores all external and internal identifiers of a customer such as SSN, MSISDN, IMSI, and SIM
entities.party_address_rel: Defines the relationship between a customer and their addresses including home, billing, and office roles
entities.kyc_verification: Stores customer identity verification results required for regulatory compliance

columns.party_id: Canonical enterprise identifier for a customer
columns.full_name: Complete customer name constructed from first and last names
columns.email: Primary email address of the customer
columns.ssn: Customer social security number used for identity verification
columns.id_type_cd: Type of customer identifier such as SSN, Passport, Driver License, MSISDN, IMSI, or SIM
columns.id_value: Actual value of the customer identifier
columns.msisdn: Mobile phone number assigned to the customer subscription
columns.imsi: Unique network identifier of a SIM card
columns.sim_serial: Physical serial number of a SIM card
columns.plan_cd: Enterprise service plan identifier defining tariff and benefits
columns.service_status_cd: Lifecycle state of the telecom service such as Active, Suspended, or Terminated
columns.billing_cycle_cd: Billing frequency of the account such as monthly or quarterly
columns.payment_method_cd: Enterprise payment method classification such as credit card, bank transfer, or cash
columns.credit_risk_cd: Enterprise financial risk classification of the customer
columns.account_status_cd: Lifecycle state of the billing account such as open, suspended, or closed
columns.address_role_cd: Role of the address for a customer such as home, billing, or office
columns.verification_status_cd: KYC verification result such as verified, pending, or rejected
